mapper.select:
select m.*, s.name as supplier_name, c.name as catalog_name, f.name as manufacturer_name from material m left join supplier s on m.supplier_id = s.id left join material_catalog c on m.catalog_id = c.id left join manufacturer f on m.manufacturer_id = f.id
and m.material_type_code like concat( '%', #{request.materialTypeCode}, '%')
and m.material_name like concat( '%', #{request.materialName}, '%')
and m.material_trade_name like concat( '%', #{request.materialTradeName}, '%')
order by m.gmt_modified desc
